label: 上野親王
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The Governor of the province of Kanzuke (also Kamutsuke or Kōzuke, roughly present Gumma Prefecture), like that of Hitachi and Kazusa, was a Prince, but the post was a sinecure, and the province was actually administered by a deputy.[上野、群馬、常陸、上総][RK]
